#summary Rule Functions > MountType

= mounttype( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments matches a mounts type

== Alias ==

  * `mtype`

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = pet type (character, case insensitive)

== Remarks ==

  * "L" = land
  * "A" = flying
  * "S" = water surface
  * "U" = underwater
  * "X" = ignored/unknown

== Examples ==

{{{
mounttype( "a", "L" )
}}}
